Jax: The goblins are becoming restless and are stepping up their attacks. We must be prepared to defeat them and keep the people safe. We know that goblins fear sudden changes in temperature; if we can use both ice and fire attacks at the same time, then we should be able to repel any attacks.

Jax: If you want to create an ice attack, you can go to the magic school and learn ice magic from Wizard Angela.
